title: What are the 10 must have free apps for Jelly Bean (non-rooted)? - Quora

response.answer_text:
Apex Laucher / Nova Launcher PocketWunderlist / Any.Do 
NoNonsense Notes / Catch NotesinKa File Manager / CyanogenMod file manager (not available in play store)Battery Widget RebornHolo CompassMX PlayerApollo (not available in play store)Firefox
In no particular order: Swiftkey 3ES File ExplorerAirDroidGTasksCamScannerWhatsAppSnapseedFlipboardSkype(Your local bank app)
